com.ex.daos

Class EmployeeDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ex.daos.EmployeeDao

  • public class EmployeeDao
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provide the interaction between the Object Employee and the MongoDatabase. This class implements validation, adding updating username, updating password, updating email,finding an Employee, getting the password of the employee, and the retrieval of all existing employees.
